TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SpecialValue extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The SpecialValue enum is used to represent TestCase arguments that cannot be used as arguments to an Attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.SpecialValue Null = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Null represents a null value, which cannot be used as an argument to an attribute under .NET 1.x
